actions.name: Unburden

cost.trigger: The user consumes an equipped item.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user consumes an equipped item.
Effect: The user's SPD Stat doubles for 5 activations. Additional uses of this ability only refreshes the duration of the effect.

system.description:
Trigger: The user consumes an equipped item.
Effect: The user's SPD Stat doubles for 5 activations. Additional uses of this ability only refreshes the duration of the effect.
